summary.span: 为 .NET Framework 4.5 中的标题创建主题特定外观。

span.span: Creates the theme specific-look for headers in .NET Framework 4.5 .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 上设置或属性 ，则呈现将恢复为默认 实现。If the or properties are set on the , the rendering reverts back to the default implementation. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ```   singleChild ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` CLR 命名空间的 xmlns 前缀。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 通常，xmlns 前缀和映射在 XAML 根元素中定义 (未显示) 。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown). *singleChild**singleChild* 单个对象元素子级，表示边框绘制的对象。A single object element child, representing the object that the border is drawn around. 此对象必须是 。This object must be a .
